summary: Frontend testing for cache-first performance overhaul on 3 pages: profile.tsx, listing/[id].tsx, my-listings.tsx. FIXED: Added missing ActivityIndicator import to profile.tsx and listing/[id].tsx. All 4 pages tested load instantly without full-page spinners.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed 2 files with missing ActivityIndicator import from react-native: (tabs)/profile.tsx, listing/[id].tsx
profile.tsx line 396 uses ActivityIndicator for inline badge loading - import was required
listing/[id].tsx lines 1469 and 1790 use ActivityIndicator for offer submission button - import was required
my-listings.tsx correctly did not need ActivityIndicator import (no usage found)
Cache-first pattern correctly implemented - pages render instantly with cached or empty state

bug_fixes.issue: ActivityIndicator used on line 396 (MyBadgesSection loading state) but not imported from react-native
ActivityIndicator used on lines 1469 and 1790 (offer modal submit button) but not imported from react-native

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 184 verified cache-first pattern for 3 more pages: /profile, /listing/[id], /profile/my-listings. Fixed 2 bugs - profile.tsx and listing/[id].tsx were missing ActivityIndicator import. All pages load instantly without full-page spinners. Total pages refactored this session: 29 (8 settings + 4 property + 5 auto/checkout + 4 blog/premium/tabs + 5 profile + 3 current batch).
